title: Gentle fade-in for romantic hero image (pre-Yes screen)

requirements.summary: Add a subtle fade-in on initial render for the romantic hero image while preserving the existing floating motion, with reduced-motion support.
acceptanceCriteria: When the app first loads on the main prompt screen, the hero image fades in smoothly (not an abrupt appearance).
The fade-in is subtle and does not distract from the existing layout or interactions.
The existing floating motion on the hero image remains (fade-in should not remove the current float effect).
If the user has reduced-motion enabled, the fade-in animation is disabled or minimized.

file_operations.description: Add a dedicated hero-image animation utility (e.g., a combined fade-in + float animation) that runs the fade-in once on initial render while keeping the existing float loop; include a prefers-reduced-motion override that disables or minimizes the fade-in (and reduces overall motion).

Update the pre-Yes screen romantic hero to use the new combined fade-in+float class (replacing the current float-only class) so the image smoothly appears on initial render without changing the existing Valentine Yes/No flow or the hero asset reference.
